system.description:
A small leather pouch which can magically duplicate coins placed inside it.

  • When found: Filled with 26 coins of each type (cp, sp, ep, gp, pp).

  • Refilling: Each morning, duplicates any coins left in it, producing up to 25 coins of each type it contains. (e.g. if a single gold piece is left in the pouch, the following day it will contain 26gp.)

  • If completely emptied: The purse permanently loses its magical power.
